channel.title: Small problem with client timers
channel.description:
ive been looking at some timers and when i tried to add one in my client the timer doesnt do anything... it seems to stay at the number i set it on. i copied "logoutdelay" and made a new timer out of it but like i said it didnt work. can someone explain how i would make one?
---EDIT---
i think i can rep now so if you help me theres some rep in it for you :eek:

item.title: Small problem with client timers
